text:
@GOPLeader Not drinking the Kool Aid
Trump, 
US Short PPE & Test capability,No swift enactment of Defense Procurement Act
+
I do not support Mandatory wearing of masks
+
Open America,Let the Virus Do,What the Virus Do,Safe 4 99%
I take NO responsibility 4 the spread of COVID-19 & The Dead
